title.narrative: 1. Research Knowledge and Mobilization :1.4 Music Therapy for GBV survivors

description.narrative: During the documentation of direct and indirect cases of violations against women with disabilities in the allocated governorates Amman (Sweileh), Zarqa, Ajloun and Karak, carried out by trained field workers, it was evident that there are cases which will require continuous follow-up and referral to the Institute for Family Health Centers. These selected survivors of GBV and family violence will be provided with the psychosocial support services including the currently ongoing music therapy sessions, a rehabilitative practice similar to physiotherapy sessions, at the IFH centres conducted by KHF sister organization the National Music Conservatory.
Providing GBV cases with psychosocial support through music therapy sessions over a period of one month.
